Hymn.English: 9 Let Your priests be clothed with righteousness, And let Your saints shout for joy.

Hymn.Arabic: وأبرارك يبتهجون من أجل داود عبدك،

Hymn.English: 132:1 Lord, remember David And all his afflictions;

Hymn.Arabic: كما أقسم الرب ونذر لإله يعقوب. هلليلويا "
Hymn.English: 2 How he swore to the Lord, And vowed to the Mighty One of Jacob:.     Alleluia
